data.text: I love being able to work here (finally!), and truly believe in the Bentley's philosophy, and practice what I preach with my own dog.

I always wanted a pug named Regis since I was a little girl, so he's my dream come true! We love traveling all around Milwaukee, and he's training to be a service dog currently. I am a Reference and Instruction Librarian in the evenings at a local college.
